system.summary: Forge armor, a weapon, or another metallic item.

description.value:
You can create one non-magical armor, weapon, or metalcraft. So long as you have relevant materials equal to ¾ of the item’s cost, you can work on creating the item over the course of short or long rests. Each Rest Action you spend working on it, make an Intelligence (Craft) check against DC 8. Each success counts as 1 completed work session, a failure does not. Depending on the item’s actual cost, it takes more work sessions to complete, as determined by the Forging Table below.

  • If you do not have access to a furnace or some similarly hot heat source, increase the DC to 16.
